CustomField.description: Name of the certificate Record you used to sign the SDocs connected App. In the Connected App settings, under the API (Enable OAuth Settings) header a Digital Signature was uploaded. This corresponds the the name (Label) of the certificate record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Name of the certificate Record you used to sign the SDocs connected App. In the Connected App settings, under the API (Enable OAuth Settings) header a Digital Signature was uploaded. This corresponds the the name (Label) of the certificate record.
CustomField.label: ConnectedAppCertificateName
